item.title: Bhakti: The Path of Devotion
item.description: How does Faith or Devotion impact us?

item.title: Vedanta: The ancient wisdom
item.description: Let’s get some perspective We go through life and have a variety of experiences, and we read these experiences based on our likes/dislikes, our sense of good/bad, and whether is makes us feel pleasant/unpleasant.
